message: I propose dividing the money equally, with you receiving $400000. This ensures a fair distribution while also providing you with a substantial amount.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, with me taking the larger share since I'm the one making the offer. This way we both get a good amount of money.
I suggest an equal division of the remaining funds, ensuring fairness and mutual benefit. Both of us will receive $500000.
